descriptionHtml:
A follower for the heart.... 
He can fight dirty, be cheerful the next moment but he is yours to do with as you please.

- He has in his inventory Ebony armor and sword, bow, arrows count of either of a 1,000 or 10,000 

-His looks are good ,He has Apachcii Hair He dose come as he looks.

Requirements

Skyrim
Updates
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
Apachii Hair.esm
Apachii hair male.esm


-He is located in Solidute near the Blue Place Gate
THIS IS MY FIRST MOD EVER PLEASE BE KIND AND LET BE KNOW OF BUGS OR GLITHCHES THANK YOU ^-^
